report.title: LuxBio: Sites Outside Square Check Report 2
report.description: Form Internal Report: Used by the Location module on MNHNL/LuxBio forms to identify those Sites which have a boundary which crosses the boundary of their parent location.
report.query: SELECT l2.name as square, l.name as site_name, l.id as site_id FROM locations l INNER JOIN locations l2 ON l2.id = l.parent_id WHERE l.deleted = FALSE AND l.location_type_id IN (#primary_loc_type_id#, #secondary_loc_type_id#) AND TRUE = (CASE WHEN l.boundary_geom is null THEN FALSE WHEN (GeometryType(l.boundary_geom) = 'POINT' OR GeometryType(l.boundary_geom) = 'MULTIPOINT' OR GeometryType(l.boundary_geom) = 'LINESTRING' OR GeometryType(l.boundary_geom) = 'MULTILINESTRING' OR GeometryType(l.boundary_geom) = 'POLYGON' OR GeometryType(l.boundary_geom) = 'MULTIPOLYGON') THEN ST_Covers(l2.boundary_geom, l.boundary_geom) = FALSE WHEN GeometryType(l.boundary_geom) = 'GEOMETRYCOLLECTION' THEN (CASE WHEN ST_IsEmpty(ST_CollectionExtract(l.boundary_geom, 1)) = FALSE THEN ST_Covers(l2.boundary_geom, ST_CollectionExtract(l.boundary_geom, 1)) = FALSE ELSE FALSE END) OR (CASE WHEN ST_IsEmpty(ST_CollectionExtract(l.boundary_geom, 2)) = FALSE THEN ST_Covers(l2.boundary_geom, ST_CollectionExtract(l.boundary_geom, 2)) = FALSE ELSE FALSE END) OR (CASE WHEN ST_IsEmpty(ST_CollectionExtract(l.boundary_geom, 3)) = FALSE THEN ST_Covers(l2.boundary_geom, ST_CollectionExtract(l.boundary_geom, 3)) = FALSE ELSE FALSE END) ELSE FALSE END) #order_by#
